body.name: Graco Nautilus 2.0 LX 3-in-1 Harness Booster Car Seat ft. InRight Latch, Hex

features: 3-in-1 harness booster helps protect your child, from toddler to big kid
Grows with your child from forward-facing harness (22-65 lb) to highback booster (40-100 lb) to backless booster (40-120 lb)
No-Rethread Simply Safe Adjust Harness System allows the headrest and harness to adjust together in one motion
Featuring an updated, sleeker design with quilted soft goods for a more modern look
InRight LATCH provides an easy, one-second attachment with an audible click to help ensure secure installation

body.description: The Graco® Nautilus® 2.0 LX ft. InRight™ LATCH 3-in-1 Harness Booster Car Seat can be used from toddler to youth, keeping your growing child safe. With 3 modes of use, your child can ride securely with a forward-facing harness from 22-65 lb, a highback booster from 40-100 lb, and a backless booster seat from 40-120 lb. The updated, sleeker design includes quilted soft goods and InRight™ LATCH provides an easy, one-second attachment with an audible click to help ensure secure installation. Its Simply Safe Adjust™ harness allows you to adjust the harness and headrest together as your child grows, with no time-consuming rethreading. You'll appreciate the strength of the steel-reinforced frame and 4-position recline for comfort and fit. The booster car seat also includes 2 personal cup holders to help your little passenger enjoy the ride. The car seat is Graco® ProtectPlus Engineered™ to help protect in frontal, side, rear, and rollover crashes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Highlights you will love: It supports growing children between 22 and 120 lb Updated design with quilted soft goods for a more modern look 10-position adjustable headrest and 4-position recline seat help keep your child comfy 2 easy-to-clean cup holders keep your child's drinks close at hand Steel-reinforced frame provides strength and durability for 10 years of use Graco ProtectPlus Engineered Graco Nautilus 2.0 LX ft. InRight LATCH 3-in-1 Harness Booster Car Seat Grows with Your Child The Graco Nautilus 2.0 LX ft. InRight LATCH is a 3-in-1 Harness Booster that grows with your child from toddler to big kid. This forward-facing harness booster (22 to 65 lb) converts to a highback booster (40 to 100 lb), then backless booster (40 to 120 lb). InRight LATCH provides an easy, one-second attachment with an audible click for secure installation, while a new, updated design with quilted soft goods offers more style and comfort for your big kid.

3-in-1 Harness Booster Stage 1 The forward-facing harness booster seat can support children from 22 to 65 lb securely with a 5-point harness. Stage 2 Convert the seat into a highback belt-positioning booster that can support children from 40 to 100 lb. Stage 3 Remove the back support to create a backless booster that's designed for children between 40 and 120 lb.

Key Features You'll Love No-Rethread Simply Safe Adjust Harness Adjust the height of the 10-position headrest and harness in one motion with the Simply Safe Adjust Harness System, ensuring your child is always properly secured. Quilted Soft Goods Updated, sleeker design with quilted soft goods for a more modern look. InRight LATCH InRight LATCH provides an easy, one-second attachment with an audible click to help ensure secure installation. Steel-Reinforced Frame A steel-reinforced frame provides strength and durability for 10 years of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Pleasant Surprise
reviews.reviewText: I must admit, I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this car seat. It ticks off all the right boxes, making it a great choice for parents and caregivers alike.Firstly, installation was a breeze. The design and features allowed for easy and quick setup in any car. Moving it between vehicles was a hassle-free task, as it wasn't overly heavy or cumbersome.The comfort level of this car seat is remarkable. The ample padding provides a cozy and snug environment for the child, making long journeys much more enjoyable for them.Safety is a top priority, and I was pleased to find that this car seat excelled in securing the child properly. It offered the peace of mind I needed when driving, knowing that my little one was well-protected.One aspect that particularly impressed me was the price. While I usually lean towards more premium brands for my child, this Graco car seat proved to be a worthy contender. It delivers exceptional quality at a reasonable price point, making it an excellent value for the money.Honestly, I never thought I'd consider a Graco car seat, but this one changed my perception entirely. The brand has done an outstanding job with this product, and I can confidently recommend it to others. If you're on the lookout for a reliable, easy-to-use, and well-priced car seat, look no further!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 6 year old loves this seat
reviews.reviewText: As someone who has been through MANY car seats, boosters we highly recommend this one. Ordered for our 6 year old daughter who has mentioned it be super comfortable and loves the 2nd cup holder. Easy to clean and install all while being safe and stable in the car! Color is perfect gender neutral- will pass down to my nephew

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Needed a car seat that was easy to swap between vehicles and this one is great! It's light weight and relatively slim and my toddler says it's comfy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Graco Nautilus 2.0 x 3-in-1
reviews.reviewText: Relatively easy to install. 3, 5 & 7-year olds all say it's comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They come unassembled but if you look at the directions, it’s very easy to put together. Easy install in both an SUV and full size pickup truck. I docked it a star because the cup holders keep popping out. Which per the manufacture they must be installed at all times. They just need a better snap in system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I researched so mamy car seats and finally settled on this one. It’s sleek and easy to use! The back pad lifts so you can see the belt path, and I love the different options to tilt. Most other booster car seats do not have that option. No concerns here so far. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great seat. Grandson fits so much better. Great features and water and drink holders

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Install; Great for Toddlers+
reviews.reviewText: After reading through all the options for forward-facing car seats that would grow with our toddler we selected the Graco Nautilus.We first purchased the new "2.0" model but the material was really thin and my kiddo found it uncomfortable during our first road trip with it. We returned it and bought this one instead. It has a lot more material, so we're hoping it's more comfy for longer rides. I like that it gets wider as it adjusts for a taller kid, unlike the 2.0 that stays slim.Only negative is that it came missing the latch belt. Thankfully it's not required to install. We just had to use the vehicle's seatbelt instead, which is recommended for kiddos over 45 lbs anyway.We're much more happy with this one and my kid gets a bit more leg room than he had with the Graco 4Ever he was initially in.Edit: We've been using the car seat for about a year now and it's still great! Pretty portable and very secure. We also found the included latch belt! It is just tucked away in a secret compartment just below the Snuglock hatch. Updated stars to 5/5 now that we discovered the missing piece.

reviews.reviewTitle: Llegó antes y en excelentes condiciones
reviews.reviewText: Llegó antes de la fecha programada, súper bien empacando. Mi hijo feliz con su silla, apta para niños a partir de los 5 años. Es cómoda y GRACCO por excelencia los estándares de seguridad que brinda en sus productos
